ios.sim.debug.build: xcodebuild -workspace ios/ecommerceApp.xcworkspace -scheme ecommerceApp -configuration Debug -sdk iphonesimulator -derivedDataPath ios/build

ios.sim.release.build: export RCT_NO_LAUNCH_PACKAGER=true && xcodebuild -workspace ios/ecommerceApp.xcworkspace -UseNewBuildSystem=YES -scheme e-commerceApp -configuration Release -sdk iphonesimulator -derivedDataPath ios/build
